ScenarioDef.label: Asari revenge
ScenarioDef.description:
After losing their memories, asari searched their home for decades, but have not found any clues. After a while, when they are desperate and scattered in all directions, their sensors showed a strange signal. Alarmed and concerned about, they went straight to the epitsenter this signal. It was an ancient artifact, an ancient civilization Protheans who died in consequence of a great harvest.

Azari , who learned the truth about their past and about the fate of the entire galaxy that is affected by the Reapers, decided to join forces and colonize the planet to rise again, to find the good name of a great race and hit back the approaching threat. 
You will play for asari race. 
Make Asari great again!
